participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Caring and family-oriented, enjoys spending quality time with loved ones.
participant_1.background: my wife and kids are the best. i am a plumber. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife. i have three children. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Energetic and dedicated, he has a passion for coaching and values family time.
participant_2.background: coffee is my preferred beverage. i coach little league baseball. i have five sons. i drive a mini van. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings.

content.text: i do   i ve a wife and kid as well
